booking.title: Book a Service
home.beta_banner: 🌍 Global Beta Launch - Available in {{count}} countries
home.headline: Universal Booking Platform
home.tagline: Book any service, anywhere, instantly. One-click booking with AI assistance and {{fee}} commitment fee guarantee.
home.feature_grid.title: Experience the Future of Booking
home.feature_grid.chat.title: Real-Time Booking Chat
home.feature_grid.chat.desc: AI-powered chat interface that extracts booking intent and creates real-time bookings with instant payment processing.
home.feature_grid.radius.title: AI Radius Scaling
home.feature_grid.radius.desc: Intelligent location-based search that adapts to service density and user preferences for optimal provider matching.
home.core.commitment.title: {{fee}} Commitment
home.core.commitment.desc: Revolutionary micro-deposit system ensures serious bookings
home.core.assistant.title: AI Booking Assistant
home.core.assistant.desc: Conversational AI handles complex booking requirements
home.core.map.title: Map Abstraction
home.core.map.desc: Privacy-first location system with smart radius zones
home.core.guarantees.title: Booking Guarantees
home.core.guarantees.desc: Self-enforcing contracts with automatic dispute resolution
home.launch_stats.title: Global Scale, Local Feel
home.cta.title: Ready to Transform Booking?
home.cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using Bookiji to streamline their booking process.
home.commitment_banner: Only {{fee}} commitment fee • No hidden charges
chat.subtitle: AI-powered booking with instant payment
chat.greeting: Hi! I'm Bookiji, your AI booking assistant. I can help you find and book any service. What are you looking for?
chat.input_placeholder: Try: Book a haircut for tomorrow at 2 PM
feature.map_protection.title: AI-Powered Map Protection
feature.map_protection.desc: Protecting vendor privacy with intelligent radius scaling
privacy.explainer: Vendors are shown as availability zones, not exact locations. This protects their privacy while helping you find nearby services.
demo.platform_title: Bookijiプラットフォームデモ
demo.experience_body: AI搭載プラットフォームでサービスを予約するのがいかに簡単かご覧ください。プロバイダーの検索から支払いの完了まで、数秒で完了します。
demo.step1.title: ステップ1: サービスを見つける
demo.step1.body: AIチャットまたは検索を使用して、必要なものを正確に見つけます
demo.step2.title: ステップ2: 場所を選択
demo.step2.body: スマート半径システムが、プライバシーを保護しながら近くのプロバイダーを見つけます
demo.step3.title: ステップ3: $1コミットメント
demo.step3.body: 予約を確認するために$1だけ支払います - 隠れた費用はありません
demo.step4.title: ステップ4: 即座の確認
demo.step4.body: 即座の確認とプロバイダーの詳細を取得
